meanings.definition: To melt (metal) and cast it again.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith was resmelting the old sword to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The factory resmelted the scrap metal to create new products.
meanings.sent3: The resmelting process turned the dull metal into a shiny masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: She resmelted her mistakes and forged a new path forward.
meanings.sent5: The resmelting of the metal transformed it into a work of art.

meanings.definition: The act of melting and casting metal again.
meanings.sent1: The resmelting of the bronze statue restored its original beauty.
meanings.sent2: Recycling involves the resmelting of various metals for reuse.
meanings.sent3: The resmelting of the metal seemed like a magical transformation.
meanings.sent4: The concept of resmelting old jewelry into new designs fascinated her.
meanings.sent5: The resmelting process requires precision and skill to achieve the desired outcome.
